title.rendered: Staff Spotlight: Callum Williams MAAT, Accounts Senior

content.rendered:
We talk to Callum Williams about his role as an Accounts Senior here at The Accountancy Partnership.

Give an overview of the duties, functions, and responsibilities of your job.

Managing a portfolio of clients consisting of accounts, VAT, and tax returns, ensuring all deadlines are met in the most efficient and tax efficient way.

How are you able to use your skills to solve problems?

Mental arithmetic comes in handy dealing with lots of figures.

Where’s your favourite place to visit on days off?

Goodison Park to watch The Mighty Blues

Tell us about your proudest achievement.

Completing my qualifications to become MAAT qualified

What are you reading/binge watching at the moment?

The Office, Suits and Brooklyn 99, although not the first time watching any of them.

Who do you admire, and why?

My parents, they have supported me all my life and helped me through my accountancy qualifications.

What question would you really like to answer, and what’s the answer?!

Q) Who did a better job, ‘Agent Rafa’ or Agent Carlo?
A) With only one of them being successful I would have to say Agent Carlo

 
Find out more about the services we offer by hitting the live chat button, or get an instant quote online. Interested in joining the team? Check out our recruitment page!
